summary: Completed UI testing of Contacts and Buyer Personas pages. All requested UI improvements are working correctly: Expand/Collapse All button, groups ordered by contact count (descending), fictitious names (display_name) as group titles, area/sector info below titles, and Buyer Personas table with Nombre column showing display_name.

issues: Minor: Console warning about nested button elements in AccordionTrigger - does not affect functionality

passed_tests: Contacts page - 'Expandir Todo' button visible and functional
Contacts page - Button toggles to 'Colapsar Todo' when clicked
Contacts page - Button toggles back to 'Expandir Todo' when collapsed
Contacts page - Groups ordered by contact count (descending): 298, 181, 133, 80, 77, 38, 27, 23, 18, 16, 16, 12, 9, 8, 6...
Contacts page - Group titles show fictitious names (display_name): 'Mariana Otros', 'Roberto Otros', 'Mateo', 'Carlos Otros', 'Diana Otros', etc.
Contacts page - Area info displayed below title: 'Direcciones de RRHH', 'Otras Direcciones', 'Sin Clasificar', 'Direcciones Comerciales', etc.
Contacts page - Sector info displayed below title: 'Otros Sectores', 'General', 'Pharmaceuticals', 'Telecommunications', etc.
Buyer Personas page - Table has 'Nombre' column header
Buyer Personas page - Table has 'Área' column header
Buyer Personas page - Table has 'Descripción' column header
Buyer Personas page - Table has 'Keywords' column header
Buyer Personas page - Table has 'Acciones' column header
Buyer Personas page - 'Nombre' column shows display_name (fictitious names): 'Miguel Automotriz', 'Carlos Automotriz', 'Diana Automotriz', etc.
Buyer Personas page - Three tabs available: 'Por Sector', 'Por Área', 'Especiales'
Buyer Personas page - Sectors show persona count and 'Activo' badge
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Console warning about nested button elements in AccordionTrigger component (line 542 in Contacts.jsx) - the 'Revisar' button is nested inside the accordion trigger button. This is a React hydration warning but does not affect functionality.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI improvements for Contacts and Buyer Personas pages are working correctly. The Contacts page shows 965 contacts in 29 groups, ordered by contact count (descending). Each group displays the fictitious name (display_name) as the title with area and sector info below. The Expand/Collapse All button toggles correctly. The Buyer Personas page shows 79 total personas with the 'Nombre' column displaying the display_name (fictitious names).

expand_collapse_button.details: Button toggles between 'Expandir Todo' and 'Colapsar Todo' correctly

fictitious_names_contacts.details: Group titles show display_name: 'Mariana Otros', 'Roberto Otros', 'Mateo', 'Carlos Otros', 'Diana Otros', 'Miguel Otros', 'Diana Farma', 'Mariana Farma', 'Roberto Farma', etc.

area_sector_info.details: Area and sector displayed below each group title with icons

buyer_personas_nombre_column.details: 'Nombre' column shows display_name: 'Miguel Automotriz', 'Carlos Automotriz', 'Diana Automotriz', 'Mariana Automotriz', etc.

buyer_personas_table_columns.details: Table has all required columns: Nombre, Área, Descripción, Keywords, Acciones
